unnormalised: ## Fintech Follies: Digital Paisa-chea Raanant Hason Vat Kaddop
normalised: ## Fintech Follies: Digital Paisa-chea Zonglachem Haso Kaddun Margdarshan

unnormalised: TechFinancial-anchem gannem tumi aikollam dista, hã? Klubant yevkar! Hem finance-chem ekdom torong raan, punn cowboiyan ani saloon-anchea bodlek, hanga amchea kodden hoodi, laptop ani boreach zobdanchi garjita zata ji Chennai-chea unhalleant ceiling fan-ak fatt fatt girki martali. Konnaka digital rupee-ancher thokar lagleat ani hanv mandta title thoddem sangtam, punn tumchea sorkhet utponnachi, punn fattim hanv tumcho margdorsok zatam.
normalised: Tor, tuka Fintech-achem sirenachim gitam aikuk ailem, hã? Klubak yetã! Tem finance-achem eka dongrachem jivit, punn cowboy ani saloon-anchea bodlek amkam hoodies, laptop ani jargon-amchem purnn asa tem Chennai-achea unhalleachea ceiling fan-ant fãvonk laitat. Kitem korcheak poddtto munnn mhaka khobor na. Hanv tuka sarkastic, punn khup upyogi margdarshan ditã.

unnormalised: Poilech hem sangunk zai ki kotthint zata: thoddke rup. Vochunk ekdem sope dista. UPI, RTGS, NEFT, KYC, AML, ani boreach ani ek lhan desh korunk puro. Tumchem jivit sompem korunk kelam. Punn ekdom nisteman sangta ki hanv Fintechanese-chem PhD korunk zai maka Rs. 500 mazyai auyk divunk.
normalised: Poile, acronym-achi chint'na kortã. Ganv,alphabet soup sarkhem asa. Amchea kodden U-P-I, R-T-G-S, N-E-F-T, K-Y-C, A-M-L ani eka lhan desak korcheak purnn zata. Te tujem jivit sope kortat, punn mhaka dislam ki mhaka Fintechanese-chea PhD zai, tenna mhaka panchshẽ rupia mhojea aai-k diunk zata.

unnormalised: Ani ekdom nistem "disruptive" sood laytat. Dor ekea satollea, dista, ek navin app amchem paiso vapurchi podhdhat bodlunk vachan dita. "Ek proffesonal-ak divop!" tem dukhurtat. "Zalich goll zodd!" tem mandavetat. Sarv sadebhashen sangtalea AI, blockchain, ani pori zalam torechen dharunuch. Satyak? Borem ekdhi korta tumchem takalle dukhop ani kityak tumchem paiso gele tem vicharun. Zoxem tednam hanv dhandho korun sodak mazo bhava-chem vicharun kelo, to "stock market guru" aslo. Ek moladik vishoy hanv zonunk podla, borem vicharun zai tem. Avghodd vadyelem.
normalised: Tevuy constant barrage "disruptive" navi-anchi. Dor ek satolleak, ek navin app amchi paisachi vat bodolunk ut'tar dita. "Expert-achem sarkhem invest kara!" te bãgo martat. "Zolldich dhon zal!" te khõs khõs kortat. Zãv A-I, blockchain ani ashãnchem ek combination asta. Pun, tuvem mhojem paisa kitek gelam mhunnon chint'nk poddta. Mhojea cousin-achea tipacho vapor korun hanv day trade korunk chol'lo tenna sarkem asa. Diversification-ache vishayan hanvem eka valuable lesson shikli.

unnormalised: Divop-anchem ulayop, kite mhunn tumi vollakhlam kite kon fintech campani tumcho best friend asa, zaka tum divop-acho sallho dita? Hem ekdom sukhal ani viswas dita, zonnun tum sangata tim "algorithm" sarv sadern tumchea mama-chea WhatsApp grupanchea tin fundanchem mandta. Ani fees? Chalo sangunk zai, tim boreponnachen borepolea websitelen dakoitat toxi nistim nant. Borik kiten asa tem poloy!
normalised: Investment-ache vishayan uloita tenna, dor ek Fintech company atam tujea best friend-achea sarkhem, tujak invest korchea vatavaran samaz martat? Tem tujem uncle-anchea WhatsApp group-achea dor eka mon'xak eka mutual funds suchayta. Ani fees? Te completely transparent nastana, tumi website-ak polleitat. Fine print check kara!

unnormalised: Digital wallet-ancher mat uloyonaka. Tum sodunchem borem asat, kite? Sorkhem upai tumcha chai-achem, tumcha auto-rickshaw ride-achem, tumcha nisthem impusem vostu online dokanantun "authentic" Tibetan gazachea vosti vikta. Punn tednam, BAM! Server issue. Transaction failure. "Atam pun yevok zai". To asthana, auto driver tuka odhgi dukhi distat, ani chai wallah tum kitem divop-achea karto divop? Aah, progresso-chem sukh.
normalised: Digital wallets-anche vishayan hanv uloita tenna mhaka khup tras dita. Te convenient asunk zai, hã? Chai, auto-rickshaw ride, Tibetan singing bowls vikun amkam online dukanam diunk ek sope vatavaran dita. Punn, B-A-M! Server issues. Transaction failures. "Punn tum atam try kara." Tem auto driver tuka polleun ek dukhi nodor ditat, ani chai wallah tuka I-O-Us dinvk chintunk lagtat. Ah, progress-achim khushi.

unnormalised: Ani surokshe-achem bhag visrunk nako. Fintech company-anchem kothit astench boreponnachem divllea-anchea ani borea surokshe-chea system-ak dakoita. Punn nistem zatam, lokank sangta. Phishing scams boreponnachem borem, hackers boreponnachem dhandel ani mazo password "password123" (mat giddkhayun... bore zalam). Mukh, savdhan rav. Sandeght zodd-ancher click marunaka, tumcho OTP konnak diunk naka, ani zor tem mhunech, tumcho password bodlunk nako.
normalised: Ani security aspect-ak visoronaka. Fintech company-anche impenetrable firewalls ani multi-layered authentication systems asat mhunn bãgo martat. Punn sat, phishing scams khup smart asat, hackers khup craftier asat, ani mhojem password "password one two three" asa (zõdekorun...mostly). Dhakhe dya. Suspicious links-ancher click kor naka, tujea O-T-P-ak konak diunaka, ani tum thode disank password bodol kara.

unnormalised: Onboarding-chea kaman hem ekkom khushi asta, khas korun KYC kaman. Bank account ugoddop kassa rocket-ak avkashent vochunk kam asat. Punn nako, fintech company-anchem tumcho Aadhaar card, tumcho PAN card, tumcho zolm-achem certificate, tumcha avoichem aglem nav, ani rokhthachem sample, sodik tum chukun Nigerian prince nant tumchom paisa tambaunvchi nantarunt. Okay, hanv borik gidden zata. Punn zatam mhunn dista.
normalised: Onboarding process ek comedic masterpiece zãunk xakta, K-Y-C part zãvnu asa. Rocket-ak space-ant launch korcheak lagtat tea poros bank account ugddunk khup paperwork zai mhunn tuka dista. Pun, Fintech company-ank tujem Aadhaar card, tujem P-A-N card, tujem birth certificate, tujea grandmother-achem maiden name ani blood sample zai, tem tum secretly ek Nigerian prince na mhunn zanncheak te platform-ant money launder korunk chol'lai. Zõdekorun hanv thodem exaggerating kortã. Punn, tem aso dista.

unnormalised: Punn, avghodd aikunk, fintech-ache boreponniche gunn asat. Hem finance-chem seva dita lakhani lokank zokank aglya banking-anchea duryeant nasli. UPI-n lhan dhande bodlle, ani online shopping-chea kaman sompem asa. Ani tradiciona banking-anchem payan vachoy! Compitishon customer-ak borem, nantren?
normalised: Punn, quirks ani foibles assa, Fintech-achea merits asat. Te million Indian-ank financial services diunk ut'tar dita je adim traditional banking system-ant nasle. U-P-I-n lhan transactions-ak bodol dila ani online shopping khup sopem asa. Ani tem traditional bank-ank dhorunk zata! Competition consumer-ak borem asa, hã?

unnormalised: Mhonn fintech fuddarencho? Zait. Borom asa? Kadich nant. Punn thoddem zonnunchem asa. Tumchm dil bore zannunk zai, tum bore bhakhen zannunk zai, ani kite financial advice garanthen favo mhunn naka mannkhi. Ani odhkhonum, boreponnacho nivaar borem korun zai. Kitenk tum tanko hasonk zank nant, tum digital wallet-ancher roddtle. Mazyant visvas thev, hanv dislam. Boryach disanim.
normalised: Tor Fintech future asa? Zãv. Tem perfect asa? Kiteak na. Punn tem khup entertaining asa. Tujem wits dhor, fine print vach, ani financial advisor-acher konnem guaranteed returns diunk ut'tar dilea tem visar naka. Ani khup mahatvachem, tujak humor diunk zai. Zõdekorun tum hasunk sokonas tor, tum tujem digital wallet-ant roddtto. Mhaka sod, hanv aso asa. Khup pora.

unnormalised: Muk, digital paisa-chem raan tum thoddem sood-achen, ravdhani-achen ani hasen vatt korunk zai. Tem Bollywood-achem cinema-achem pustokenk sod - borea girkeni ani thoddem nache-acho ankdenk voddum. Borem tum zannunk, tumchen dhanden favo zatle ani tumchen password surakshit astole. Borem tumchen bhurge, 100% favo zatlem, Krrish-kaden kothit.
normalised: Uttimt, digital paisa jungle khup research, caution ani smile-achea sangata margdarshan korunk zata. Tem Bollywood movie plot-achea sarkhem chint - twists, turns ani ek dance number asa. Khuxal asa, ani tujea transactions successful zãvcheak hanv ashikortã (ani tujea passwords secure!). Balam, 100 percent returns Krrish sarkhim fiktional asat!
